name: Mid-East Aviation Academy
about: Mid-East Aviation Academy, established in 2000 at Amman-Marka Airport, is the first privately owned flight training academy in Jordan. It boasts a modern fleet including the Piper Archer III, Piper Seminole, and Piper Warrior III, along with advanced simulators like the Alsim AL-200 and ALX (FNPT II MCC). Approved by the Jordan Civil Aviation Regulatory Commission (JCARC) and the International Air Transport Association (IATA), the academy offers comprehensive training programs, including ATP Integrated courses, cadet programs, and maintenance certifications. Its state-of-the-art facilities and highly qualified instructors ensure that graduates are ready for careers with major airlines and aviation sectors globally. Mid-East Aviation Academy is committed to providing top-tier aviation education and training, preparing students for successful careers in the aviation industry.
